actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the support of the Senate for certain United States scientists protesting the conviction and continued imprisonment of Yuri Orlov and Anatoly Shcharansky.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses Senate support of U.S. scientists protesting the conviction and imprisonment of Yuriy Orlov and Anatoly Shcharansky by the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the support of the Senate for certain United States scientists protesting the conviction and continued imprisonment of Yuri Orlov and Anatoly Shcharansky.
